\q

do not abandon wisdom and she will watch over you;\q love her and she will keep you safe.


\q
7:
Wisdom is the most important thing, so acquire wisdom\q and spend all you own so you can get understanding.
\q
8:
Cherish wisdom and she will exalt you;\q she will honor you when you embrace her.
\q
9:
She will put a wreath of honor on your head;\q she will give you a beautiful crown."


\q
10:
Listen, my son, and pay attention to my words,\q and you will have many years in your life.
\q
11:
I direct you in the way of wisdom;\q I lead you down straight paths.
\q
12:
When you walk, no one will stand in your way\q and if you run, you will not stumble.


\q
13:
Hold on to instruction, do not let it go;\q guard it, for it is your life.
\q
14:
Do not follow the path of the wicked\q and do not go along the way of those who do evil.
\q
15:
Avoid it, do not go on it;\q turn away from it and go another way.


\q
16:
For they cannot sleep until they do evil\q and they are robbed of sleep until they cause someone to stumble.
\q
17:
For they eat the bread of wickedness\q and drink the wine of violence.


\q
18:
But the path of righteous people is like the first light that grows brighter;\q it shines more and more until the fullness of the day comes.
\q
19:
The way of the wicked is like darknessâ€”\q they do not know what it is they stumble over.


\q
20:
My son, pay attention to my words;\q incline your ear to my sayings.
\q
21:
Do not let them turn away from your eyes;\q keep them in your heart.


\q
22:
For my words are life to those who find them\q and health to their whole body.
\q
23:
Keep your heart safe and guard it with all diligence,\q for from it flow the springs of life.


\q
24:
Put crooked speech away from you\q and put corrupt talk far from you.
\q
25:
Let your eyes look straight ahead\q and fix your gaze straight before you.


\q
26:
Make a level path for your foot;\q then all your ways will be secure.
\q
27: Do not turn aside to the right or to the left;\q turn your foot away from evil.
